types:type.name: ProductsStock
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type ProductsStock = {| ProductID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, ProductName: String, SupplierID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, CategoryID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, QuantituPerUnit: String, UnitPrice: Number {"typeId": "double"}, UnitsInStock: Number {"typeId": "int"}, UnitsOnOrder: Number {"typeId": "int"}, ReorderLevel: Number {"typeId": "int"}, Discontinued: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"ProductID\\\":17,\\\"ProductName\\\":\\\"Alice Mutton\\\",\\\"SupplierID\\\":7,\\\"CategoryID\\\":6,\\\"QuantituPerUnit\\\":\\\"20 - 1 kg tins\\\",\\\"UnitPrice\\\":39.0000,\\\"UnitsInStock\\\":1,\\\"UnitsOnOrder\\\":1,\\\"ReorderLevel\\\":1,\\\"Discontinued\\\":1}"}

types:type.name: ProductRequest
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type ProductRequest = {| ProductName: String, Quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"}, CustomerID: String |} {"example": "{\\\"ProductName\\\":\\\"voluptas\\\",\\\"Quantity\\\":61,\\\"CustomerID\\\":\\\"ALFKI\\\"}"}

types:type.name: OfferProposal
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type OfferProposal = {| OfferID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, EmployeeID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, PriceDiscount: Number {"typeId": "int"}, TotalPrice: Number {"typeId": "int"}, DateCreated: String |} {"example": "{\\\"OfferID\\\":32,\\\"EmployeeID\\\":32,\\\"PriceDiscount\\\":32,\\\"TotalPrice\\\":32,\\\"DateCreated\\\":\\\"2022-12-23\\\"}"}
